case_title: USA v. Alarcon Moscoso et al
case_info_full_case_name: USA v. Alarcon Moscoso et al

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to a term of imprisonment of time served on Counts 1-6 to run concurrently. Supervised Release for a term of 2 years on Counts 1-6 to run concurrently. Standard and Special Conditions imposed. Defendant shall perform 20 hours of community service as directed by the probation officer. Special Assessment in the amount of $600.00 imposed and ordered remitted. No fine imposed. Parties advised of appeal rights

charges.charge_description: 18:1028A: AGGRAVATED IDENTITY THEFT;FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS(7-12)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion made by USA

Defendant is sentenced to a term of imprisonment of time served on Counts 13-18 to run concurrently. Supervised Release for a term of 2 years on Counts 13-18 imposed and to run concurrently. Standard and Special Conditions imposed. Defendant shall perform 20 hours of community service Special Assessment in the amount of $600.00 imposed. No fine imposed.

Defendant is sentenced to a term of time served on Counts 19-24 to run concurrently. Supervised Release for a term of 2 years on Counts 19-24 to run concurrently. Standard and Special Conditions of Supervised Release. Defendant shall perform 20 hours of community service Special Assessment in the amount of $600.00 imposed. No fine imposed.
